translations: [图情]专著；专题论文（monograph 的复数）
写专题著作；写专题论文（monograph 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: The General Notices apply to all monographs and other texts of the European Pharmacopoeia.
sentences.translation: 凡例的内容适用于各论和欧洲药典中的其它章节。

sentences.sentence: No. The European Pharmacopoeia monographs are valid in all the Member States of the European Pharmacopoeia.
sentences.translation: 不需要。欧洲药典各论在欧洲药典所有成员国内均有效。

sentences.sentence: It seems certain that libraries' e-resources budget allocations will continue to change as more and more monographs become available online.
sentences.translation: 这似乎是确定的，图书馆的电子资源预算分配将继续变化，以使尽可能多的专题资料上网。
